channel.title: How i make this command donator+

item.title: How i make this command donator+
item.dc:creator: @kenvanbael kenvanbael
item.description:
@kenvanbael wrote:

[quote=“RS Gamer001, post:4, topic:352908”][quote author=kenvanbael link=topic=449224.msg3295810#msg3295810 date=1280935615]

} if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 4) { String titles = ""; String titles2 = ""; String text = command.substring(5); { if (Wins >= 0) { titles = "[Beginner]"; } if (Wins >= 50) { titles = "[Player]"; } if (Wins >= 100) { titles = "[Pker]"; } if (Wins >= 150) { titles = "[Kickass]"; } if (Wins >= 200) { titles = "[Badass]"; } if (Wins >= 250) { titles = "[Legit]"; } if (Wins >= 300) { titles = "[Prodigy]"; } if (Wins >= 400) { titles = "[Champion]"; } if (Wins >= 500) { titles = "[Master]"; } if (Wins >= 600) { titles = "[Grandmaster]"; } if (Wins >= 700) { titles = "[Legend]"; } if (Wins >= 800) { titles = "[God]"; } if (donator == 1) { titles2 = "[Donator] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles2 = "[Mod] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles2 = "[Admin] "; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*YOURRNAME*")) { titles2 = "[Owner] "; } yell("["+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"]:@dre@ "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); yellTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); } } }
You might need to change the variable wins to kills or something like that or just delete that extra crap…

but 1 is normal player
and donator,
how i make by charaters him donator?
by right?
[/quote]

It says if DONATOR ==1[/quote]
oke really, ty

Read full topic
